alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; Lower Washington County; South Central Utah; Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah; Upper Sevier River Valleys; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 09 at 2:58AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following areas, Bryce Canyon Country, South Central Utah, Southern Mountains, Upper Sevier River Valleys, Lower Washington County, Southwest Utah and Zion National Park. * WHEN...From 1 PM MDT this afternoon through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flash flooding of slot canyons, normally dry washes, slickrock areas, and other low-lying flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Bryce Canyon Country; Lower Washington County; South Central Utah; Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah; Upper Sevier River Valleys; Zion National Park
